metadata.title: CVE-2023-52653 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: SUNRPC:fix a memleak in gss_import_v2_context The ctx->mech_used.data allocated bykmemdup is not freed in neither gss_import_v2_context nor it only callergss_krb5_import_sec_context, which frees ctx on error. Thus, this patchreform the last call of gss_import_v2_context to thegss_krb5_import_ctx_v2, preventing the memleak while keepping the returnformation.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
